Italy.name: Pizza Margherita
Italy.description: Classic Neapolitan pizza with simple, fresh ingredients.
instructions: Preheat oven to highest temperature with pizza stone
Spread tomato sauce, add torn mozzarella
Bake for 60-90 seconds until crust is puffed
Add fresh basil leaves and drizzle with olive oil

Italy.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
Italy.description: Creamy Roman pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
instructions: Whisk eggs with grated cheese and pepper
Combine hot pasta with pancetta, then mix in egg mixture
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper

Italy.name: Tiramisu
Italy.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers.
instructions: Brew strong coffee and let cool
Make zabaglione with egg yolks and sugar
Dust with cocoa and chill 4+ hours

Italy.name: Risotto alla Milanese
Italy.description: Creamy saffron-infused risotto from Milan.
instructions: Toast rice in butter with shallots
Add warm stock gradually while stirring

Italy.name: Osso Buco
Italy.description: Milanese braised veal shanks with gremolata.

Italy.name: Minestrone
Italy.description: Hearty vegetable soup with pasta or rice.
instructions: Sauté garlic and onions in olive oil
Add chopped vegetables by cooking time
Add tomatoes and beans with their liquid
Simmer with Parmesan rind if using

Italy.name: Bruschetta
Italy.description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes and basil.
instructions: Top with diced tomatoes and torn basil
Drizzle with olive oil and salt

Italy.name: Focaccia
Italy.description: Fluffy olive oil-rich bread from Liguria.

Italy.name: Panna Cotta
Italy.description: Silky cooked cream dessert from Piedmont.
instructions: Heat cream with sugar and vanilla

Italy.name: Lasagna alla Bolognese
Italy.description: Layered pasta with rich meat sauce and béchamel.
instructions: Layer noodles with sauces and cheeses

Italy.name: Gnocchi alla Sorrentina
Italy.description: Pillowy potato dumplings baked with tomato and mozzarella.
instructions: Mix with flour and egg to form dough
Bake with tomato sauce and mozzarella

Italy.name: Ribolitta
Italy.description: Tuscan bread and vegetable soup.

Italy.name: Saltimbocca alla Romana
Italy.description: Roman veal cutlets with prosciutto and sage.
instructions: Top veal with prosciutto and sage

Italy.name: Arancini
Italy.description: Sicilian fried rice balls with various fillings.
instructions: Cook risotto with saffron, let cool

Italy.name: Cannoli
Italy.description: Crisp Sicilian pastry tubes with sweet ricotta filling.
instructions: Make dough with flour and Marsala
Roll thin and wrap around tubes

Italy.name: Pesto alla Genovese
Italy.description: Ligurian basil sauce with pine nuts and cheese.
instructions: Stream in olive oil while mixing

Italy.name: Bistecca alla Fiorentina
Italy.description: Florentine-style T-bone steak.
instructions: Finish with olive oil and rosemary

Italy.name: Polenta
Italy.description: Northern Italian cornmeal staple.

Italy.name: Caponata
Italy.description: Sicilian sweet-and-sour eggplant relish.

Italy.name: Tortellini in Brodo
Italy.description: Emilia-Romagna's stuffed pasta in broth.
instructions: Make filling with meats and cheese

Italy.name: Cacciucco
Italy.description: Tuscan seafood stew from Livorno.
instructions: Cook seafood in order of density

Italy.name: Panettone
Italy.description: Milanese Christmas sweet bread.
instructions: Make rich dough with long rise
Bake upside down to maintain shape

Italy.name: Amatriciana
Italy.description: Roman pasta with guanciale and tomato.

Italy.name: Cotoletta alla Milanese
Italy.description: Milanese breaded veal cutlet.

Italy.name: Zabaglione
Italy.description: Light foamy dessert from egg yolks and Marsala.
instructions: Whisk yolks and sugar over bain-marie

Italy.name: Pappa al Pomodoro
Italy.description: Tuscan tomato and bread soup.

Italy.name: Fritto Misto
Italy.description: Mixed fried seafood and vegetables.

Italy.name: Affogato
Italy.description: Simple dessert of gelato 'drowned' in espresso.

Italy.name: Stracciatella
Italy.description: Roman egg drop soup.
instructions: Slowly drizzle into broth while stirring

Italy.name: Panforte
Italy.description: Sienese dense fruitcake with spices.

Italy.name: Bucatini all'Amatriciana
Italy.description: Roman pasta with spicy tomato sauce and guanciale.

Italy.name: Sfogliatella
Italy.description: Neapolitan layered pastry with ricotta filling.

Italy.name: Cicchetti
Italy.description: Venetian small plates similar to tapas.

Japan.name: Sushi
Japan.description: Vinegared rice combined with various ingredients, primarily seafood.
instructions: Prepare sushi rice with vinegar mixture
For nigiri: form rice balls and top with fish
For maki: spread rice on nori, add fillings, and roll
Serve with wasabi and soy sauce

Japan.name: Ramen
Japan.description: Japanese noodle soup with rich broth and various toppings.
instructions: Season broth with soy sauce or miso
Assemble bowl with noodles, broth, and toppings
Add soft-boiled egg and nori last

Japan.name: Tonkatsu
instructions: Dredge in flour, egg, then panko

Japan.name: Okonomiyaki
instructions: Cook on griddle with pork topping
Add bonito flakes that 'dance' from heat

Japan.name: Takoyaki
instructions: Turn constantly with pick to form spheres

Japan.name: Soba
Japan.description: Buckwheat noodles served hot or cold.
instructions: Serve chilled with tsuyu (for zaru soba)
Or in hot dashi broth (kake soba)

Japan.name: Udon
Japan.description: Thick wheat flour noodles in broth.

Japan.name: Yakitori
Japan.description: Grilled chicken skewers with tare sauce.

Japan.name: Sukiyaki
Japan.description: Hot pot with thinly sliced beef and vegetables.
instructions: Cook meat with sugar and soy

Japan.name: Shabu-Shabu
Japan.description: Thinly sliced meat swished in hot broth.
instructions: Dip in ponzu or goma dare

Japan.name: Oden
Japan.description: Winter comfort stew with various ingredients.

Japan.name: Chawanmushi
Japan.description: Savory egg custard with delicate toppings.

Japan.name: Unagi Don
Japan.description: Grilled eel over rice with sweet sauce.

Japan.name: Katsudon
Japan.description: Tonkatsu and egg over rice bowl.

Japan.name: Oyakodon
instructions: Cover until eggs are softly set

Japan.name: Mochi
Japan.description: Chewy rice cakes for special occasions.

Japan.name: Sencha
Japan.description: Steeped green tea for daily drinking.

Japan.name: Onigiri
instructions: Shape warm rice with wet hands

Japan.name: Fugu
Japan.description: Poisonous pufferfish prepared by licensed chefs.
instructions: May include fried fugu or nabe

Japan.name: Izakaya
Japan.description: Drinking food assortment for pub fare.

Mexico.name: Tacos al Pastor
Mexico.description: Marinated pork tacos with pineapple, a Mexican adaptation of shawarma.
instructions: Blend chilies, achiote, and pineapple juice for marinade
Grill or roast pork on vertical spit if possible
Slice thinly and serve on tortillas
Top with onions, cilantro, and pineapple

Mexico.name: Mole Poblano
Mexico.description: Complex sauce with chocolate and chilies, served with chicken.
instructions: Blend with other ingredients to make sauce
Serve chicken smothered in mole with rice and tortillas

Mexico.name: Chiles en Nogada
Mexico.description: Poblano chilies stuffed with picadillo, topped with walnut sauce and pomegranate.
instructions: Make picadillo with pork and fruits

Mexico.name: Pozole
Mexico.description: Pre-Hispanic hominy stew with meat, served with toppings.
instructions: Simmer pork with garlic and onion

Mexico.name: Tamales
Mexico.description: Masa steamed in corn husks with various fillings.
instructions: Whip masa with lard until fluffy

Mexico.name: Cochinita Pibil
Mexico.description: Yucatán-style pit-roasted pork with achiote.
instructions: Make marinade with achiote and citrus
Bake at low temp for 4+ hours

Mexico.name: Barbacoa
Mexico.description: Traditionally pit-cooked lamb or goat.

Mexico.name: Enchiladas
Mexico.description: Rolled tortillas with sauce, varying by region.

Mexico.name: Chilaquiles
Mexico.description: Fried tortilla chips simmered in sauce.

Mexico.name: Tlayudas
Mexico.description: Oaxacan 'Mexican pizza' with giant crispy tortilla.

Mexico.name: Sopes
Mexico.description: Thick corn bases with pinched edges for toppings.

Mexico.name: Quesadillas
Mexico.description: Grilled masa with cheese and other fillings.

Mexico.name: Pambazos
Mexico.description: Chili-dipped bread rolls with potato filling.

Mexico.name: Carnitas
Mexico.description: Confit-style fried pork from Michoacán.

Mexico.name: Birria
Mexico.description: Jalisco's spicy goat or beef stew.

Mexico.name: Menudo
Mexico.description: Hangover-curing tripe soup.

Mexico.name: Pescado a la Veracruzana
Mexico.description: Fish in tomato-caper sauce from Veracruz.
instructions: Make sauce with tomatoes and olives

Mexico.name: Aguachile
Mexico.description: Sinaloan ceviche-style shrimp in chili-lime.

Mexico.name: Ceviche
Mexico.description: Citrus-cured seafood with vegetables.

Mexico.name: Torta Ahogada
Mexico.description: Guadalajara's 'drowned' spicy pork sandwich.

Mexico.name: Gorditas
Mexico.description: Thick masa cakes split and stuffed.

Mexico.name: Huaraches
Mexico.description: Oval masa bases resembling sandals.

Mexico.name: Molletes
Mexico.description: Open-faced bean and cheese sandwiches.

Mexico.name: Pan de Muerto
Mexico.description: Day of the Dead sweet bread with orange.

Mexico.name: Conchas
Mexico.description: Sweet bread with shell-patterned topping.

Mexico.name: Flan
Mexico.description: Caramel custard dessert.

Mexico.name: Arroz con Leche
Mexico.description: Creamy rice pudding with cinnamon.

Mexico.name: Atole
Mexico.description: Warm masa-based drink, often flavored.

Mexico.name: Horchata
Mexico.description: Refreshing rice-cinnamon drink.

Mexico.name: Jamaica
Mexico.description: Vibrant hibiscus iced tea.

Mexico.name: Michelada
Mexico.description: Beer cocktail with chili and lime.

India.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
India.description: Grilled paneer cubes in creamy tomato gravy with aromatic spices.
instructions: Mix yogurt, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, tandoori masala, and turmeric. Marinate paneer for 1 hour.
Grill paneer in oven or pan until lightly charred.
Heat butter, sauté remaining ginger-garlic paste. Add tomato puree and cook for 10 mins.
Add cream, grilled paneer, and garam masala. Simmer for 5 mins.
Garnish with coriander. Serve with naan.

India.name: Dal Makhani
India.description: Slow-cooked black lentils and kidney beans in butter-cream sauce.
instructions: Soak dal and rajma overnight. Pressure cook with salt until soft.
Heat butter, crackle cumin. Sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste, tomato puree, and cook until oil separates.
Add cooked dal, simmer on low heat for 30 mins, stirring occasionally.
Stir in cream and kasuri methi. Serve with rice.

India.name: Palak Paneer
India.description: Soft paneer cubes in vibrant spinach gravy.
instructions: Blend blanched spinach, onion, and chilies into smooth paste.
Heat ghee, crackle cumin. Add spinach paste and cook for 5 mins.
Add paneer, garam masala, and salt. Simmer for 3 mins.

India.name: Chana Masala
India.description: Spicy chickpea curry with tangy tomato base.
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions until golden. Add tomato puree and cook for 5 mins.
Add chana masala, amchur, and chickpeas. Simmer for 10 mins.
Garnish with coriander. Serve with bhatura.

India.name: Aloo Gobi
India.description: Dry curry of potatoes and cauliflower with rustic spices.
instructions: Heat oil, crackle cumin. Add turmeric and coriander powder.
Add potatoes, cook for 5 mins. Add cauliflower and salt.
Cover and cook on low heat until tender (15 mins).

India.name: Butter Chicken
India.description: Tandoori chicken in rich tomato-butter sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tandoori masala for 2 hours. Grill until charred.
Blend tomatoes, cashews, and spices into smooth paste.
Cook paste with butter, add chicken and cream. Simmer for 10 mins.

India.name: Hyderabadi Biryani
India.description: Fragrant basmati rice layered with spiced meat and saffron.
instructions: Marinate meat with yogurt, biryani masala, and fried onions for 1 hour.
Parboil rice with whole spices. Layer meat and rice in pot.
Drizzle saffron milk. Seal with dough lid. Cook on low heat for 25 mins.

India.name: Fish Curry (Goan)
India.description: Coconut-based curry with tangy tamarind and fresh fish.
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt for 10 mins. Shallow fry and set aside.
Cook coconut milk, tamarind, chili powder, and kokum for 10 mins.
Add fish, simmer for 5 mins. Serve with rice.

India.name: Chicken Chettinad
India.description: Fiery South Indian chicken curry with black pepper and coconut.
instructions: Dry roast coriander, peppercorns, and coconut. Grind to paste.
Heat oil, sauté curry leaves. Add paste and cook for 2 mins.
Add chicken and water. Simmer for 20 mins.

India.name: Keema Pav
India.description: Spiced minced meat with buttered bread rolls.
instructions: Sauté onions until brown. Add ginger-garlic paste and minced lamb.
Cook until meat browns. Add garam masala and peas. Simmer for 15 mins.
Toast pav with butter. Serve keema hot with pav.

India.name: Pani Puri
India.description: Crisp puris filled with spicy mint water and potatoes.
ingredients: 1 cup mint-coriander water (blend mint, coriander, green chili, cumin)
instructions: Poke hole in puri, stuff with potato and chickpeas.
Fill with mint water and tamarind chutney.

India.name: Vada Pav
India.description: Spicy potato fritter in a bun with chutneys.
instructions: Mix potatoes with mustard seeds, chilies, and salt. Shape into balls.
Dip in gram flour batter, deep-fry until golden.
Serve in pav with garlic chutney.

India.name: Dahi Puri
India.description: Crisp puris topped with yogurt and sweet-spicy chutneys.
instructions: Poke holes in puris. Stuff with boiled potatoes and chickpeas.
Top with yogurt, both chutneys, and sev.

India.name: Bhel Puri
India.description: Puffed rice snack with tangy tamarind and crunchy sev.
instructions: Mix puffed rice, onions, tomatoes, and chutney.
Sprinkle chaat masala and sev. Toss lightly.

India.name: Aloo Tikki
India.description: Crispy potato patties served with chutneys.
instructions: Mix potatoes, spices, and cornflour. Shape into patties.
Shallow fry until golden on both sides.

India.name: Gulab Jamun
India.description: Golden milk dumplings soaked in rose-scented syrup.
ingredients: 2 cups sugar syrup (1:1 sugar:water + cardamom + rose water)
instructions: Knead khoya, maida, and baking soda into smooth dough.
Shape into crack-free balls. Fry on low heat until golden.
Soak in warm syrup for 2 hours before serving.

India.name: Rasgulla
India.description: Spongy cottage cheese balls in light sugar syrup.
instructions: Curdle milk with lemon juice. Drain whey to make chenna (cottage cheese).
Knead chenna for 10 mins. Shape into smooth balls.
Boil sugar syrup, add balls, and cook for 15 mins covered.

India.name: Jalebi
India.description: Crispy orange coils soaked in sugar syrup.
instructions: Mix maida, yogurt, and baking soda into thick batter. Ferment for 8 hours.
Fill piping bag, squeeze spiral shapes into hot oil.
Fry until crisp, dip in warm syrup for 30 secs.

India.name: Kheer
India.description: Creamy rice pudding with nuts and cardamom.
instructions: Boil milk, add soaked rice. Simmer for 30 mins, stirring often.
Add sugar, nuts, and cardamom. Cook until thick.

India.name: Gajar Ka Halwa
India.description: Carrot pudding cooked in ghee with milk and nuts.
instructions: Sauté carrots in ghee for 10 mins. Add milk, simmer until thick.
Add sugar, cook until halwa leaves pan sides.

India.name: Naan
India.description: Leavened tandoor-baked flatbread brushed with butter.
instructions: Knead dough with flour, yogurt, sugar, and baking powder. Rest for 2 hours.
Roll into ovals, cook in hot tandoor or skillet until bubbly.

India.name: Paratha
India.description: Flaky layered flatbread cooked on griddle.
instructions: Knead stiff dough with flour, water, and salt. Rest for 15 mins.
Roll, layer with ghee, fold, and roll again.
Cook on tawa until golden spots appear.

India.name: Puri
India.description: Deep-fried puffed bread served with curries.
instructions: Knead firm dough. Roll small circles.
Fry in hot oil until they puff up.

India.name: Bhatura
India.description: Soft, fluffy deep-fried bread for chole.
instructions: Knead soft dough with all ingredients. Rest for 2 hours.
Roll into thick circles, deep-fry until golden.

India.name: Thepla
India.description: Spiced Gujarati flatbread with fenugreek.
instructions: Mix all ingredients into stiff dough. Rest for 15 mins.
Roll thin, cook on tawa with oil until crisp.

India.name: Rogan Josh (Kashmir)
India.description: Aromatic lamb curry with Kashmiri chilies and yogurt.
instructions: Brown lamb in mustard oil. Remove and set aside.
In same oil, cook spices until fragrant. Add yogurt slowly.
Return lamb, add water, and simmer for 1 hour until tender.

India.name: Dhokla (Gujarat)
India.description: Steamed savory chickpea cakes.
instructions: Mix flour, yogurt, ginger-chili paste, and sugar into batter.
Add fruit salt, pour into greased tray. Steam for 15 mins.
Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

India.name: Masala Dosa (Karnataka)
India.description: Crispy rice crepe with spiced potato filling.
instructions: Spread batter thinly on hot griddle. Drizzle oil, cook until crisp.
For filling: Temper mustard seeds, chilies, and curry leaves. Add potatoes and turmeric.
Place filling on dosa, fold, and serve with coconut chutney.

India.name: Makki di Roti & Sarson da Saag (Punjab)
India.description: Cornmeal flatbread with mustard greens curry.
instructions: Boil greens, blend with spices. Simmer with cornmeal for saag.
Knead maize flour with water. Cook rotis on tawa.

India.name: Misal Pav (Maharashtra)
India.description: Spicy sprouted curry with pav and farsan.
instructions: Pressure cook sprouts with goda masala until soft.
Serve topped with farsan, onions, and lemon. Pair with pav.

India.name: Poha
India.description: Flattened rice cooked with turmeric and peanuts.
instructions: Rinse poha, drain. Sauté mustard seeds, onions, and peanuts.
Add turmeric, poha, and salt. Cook for 3 mins.

India.name: Upma
India.description: Savory semolina porridge with vegetables.
instructions: Dry roast semolina until fragrant. Set aside.
Temper mustard seeds, add veggies. Add water and salt.
Stir in semolina, cook until thick.

India.name: Idli-Sambar
India.description: Steamed rice cakes with lentil-vegetable stew.
instructions: Steam idli batter in molds for 10 mins.
Cook dal with veggies, sambar powder, and tamarind for 15 mins.

India.name: Aloo Paratha
India.description: Stuffed potato flatbread cooked with ghee.
instructions: Knead dough. Stuff with spiced potato mixture.
Roll gently, cook on tawa with ghee until golden.

India.name: Dosa
India.description: Crispy fermented rice-lentil crepe.
instructions: Spread batter thinly on hot griddle.
Drizzle oil, cook until golden and crisp.

India.name: Jeera Rice
India.description: Fragrant basmati rice tempered with cumin.
instructions: Heat ghee, temper cumin and bay leaf. Add rice, cover for 10 mins.

India.name: Vegetable Pulao
India.description: One-pot spiced rice with mixed vegetables.
instructions: Sauté whole spices in ghee. Add veggies and rice.
Add water (1:2 ratio), cook covered for 15 mins.

India.name: Lemon Rice
India.description: Tangy South Indian rice with turmeric and peanuts.
instructions: Temper mustard seeds and peanuts in oil.
Add turmeric, rice, and lemon juice. Toss gently.

India.name: Tomato Rice
India.description: Spicy tomato-infused rice with curry leaves.
instructions: Sauté ginger-garlic paste, add tomato puree and spices.
Add rice and water. Cook until done.

India.name: Coconut Rice
India.description: Aromatic rice with fresh coconut and cashews.
instructions: Cook rice. Temper mustard seeds, chilies, and cashews.
Mix with rice and coconut. Serve warm.

India.name: Masala Chai
India.description: Spiced milk tea with ginger and cardamom.
instructions: Boil water with ginger and cardamom.
Add tea leaves, then milk. Simmer for 2 mins.

India.name: Lassi
India.description: Creamy yogurt drink, sweet or salty.

India.name: Jaljeera
India.description: Tangy cumin-mint digestive drink.
instructions: Blend mint, cumin, and spices with water.
Strain and chill. Serve with ice.

India.name: Thandai
India.description: Nutty milk drink with saffron and spices.
instructions: Soak nuts and seeds for 2 hours. Blend with milk.
Strain, add saffron. Chill before serving.

India.name: Filter Coffee
India.description: Strong South Indian decoction coffee with frothy milk.
instructions: Brew coffee in filter. Mix 1/4 decoction with hot milk and sugar.
Pour between cups to create froth.

India.name: Samosa
India.description: Crispy pastry stuffed with spiced potatoes.
instructions: Knead stiff dough with flour and oil. Rest for 30 mins.
Stuff with spiced potato mixture. Shape into cones.

India.name: Kachori
India.description: Deep-fried flaky pastry with lentil filling.
instructions: Grind dal with spices into coarse paste.
Roll dough, stuff with paste, flatten. Deep-fry.

India.name: Pakora
India.description: Vegetable fritters in chickpea batter.
instructions: Mix flour, spices, and water into thick batter.

India.name: Mirchi Bajji
India.description: Stuffed chili fritters with tangy chutney.
instructions: Slit chilies, stuff with spice mix.
Dip in batter, deep-fry until golden.

India.name: Chaat Papdi
India.description: Crisp wheat crackers topped with chutneys and yogurt.
instructions: Roll dough thin, cut circles, deep-fry until crisp.
Top with yogurt, chutneys, sev, and spices.

France.name: Coq au Vin
France.description: Classic French braised chicken in red wine with mushrooms and pearl onions.
instructions: Brown bacon, remove and set aside
Brown chicken pieces in bacon fat
Add mushrooms and onions, cook 15 more minutes

France.name: Bouillabaisse
France.description: Traditional Provençal fish stew with saffron, fennel, and rouille sauce.
ingredients: For rouille: mayo, garlic, chili, saffron
instructions: Sauté onions, fennel, and tomatoes in olive oil
Add fish stock and saffron, boil rapidly
Add firm fish first, then delicate fish
Make rouille by mixing mayo with garlic and saffron
Serve with crusty bread and rouille

France.name: Boeuf Bourguignon
France.description: A classic French stew of beef braised in red wine with mushrooms, onions, and bacon.
instructions: In a large Dutch oven, heat olive oil and cook bacon until crisp. Remove and set aside.
In the same pot, sear beef cubes until browned on all sides. Remove and set aside.
Add carrots and onions to the pot, cooking until softened. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Return beef and bacon to the pot. Sprinkle flour over the meat and stir to coat.
Add tomato paste, red wine, and beef stock. Stir in bay leaf and thyme.
Bring to a simmer, cover, and transfer to the oven. Cook for 2.5 to 3 hours.
In the last 30 minutes, sauté mushrooms in a separate pan and add to the stew.
Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

France.name: Beef Bourguignon
France.description: Slow-braised beef in Burgundy wine with vegetables and herbs.
instructions: Return beef, add wine and herbs
Braise in oven at 325°F for 2-3 hours
Serve with mashed potatoes or egg noodles

France.name: Quiche Lorraine
France.description: A savory tart with bacon, cheese, and custard filling in a pastry crust.
instructions: Roll out pie crust and line a tart pan. Prick with a fork and blind bake for 10 minutes.
Cook bacon until crisp. Remove and sauté onions in the bacon fat until soft.
Whisk together eggs, cream, milk, nutmeg, salt, and pepper.
Sprinkle bacon, onions, and cheese over the pre-baked crust.
Pour egg mixture over the filling.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until set and golden brown.

France.name: Ratatouille
France.description: Provençal vegetable stew with eggplant, zucchini, peppers, and tomatoes.
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic until soft
Serve hot or at room temperature

France.name: French Onion Soup
France.description: Caramelized onion soup topped with Gruyère cheese and baked until golden.
instructions: Caramelize onions in butter for 45 minutes
Add wine, scrape up browned bits
Add stock and herbs, simmer 30 minutes
Broil until cheese is bubbly and golden

France.name: Croque Monsieur
France.description: Grilled ham and cheese sandwich topped with béchamel sauce and more cheese.
instructions: Make béchamel: melt butter, add flour, whisk in milk
Season with nutmeg, salt, and pepper
Layer ham and half the cheese
Cover with béchamel and remaining cheese

France.name: Soupe à l'Oignon
France.description: Classic French onion soup with caramelized onions and cheesy croutons.
instructions: Melt butter with oil in a large pot. Add onions and sugar. Cook slowly for 40 minutes until deeply caramelized.
Sprinkle flour over onions and stir for 1 minute.
Add wine and scrape up any browned bits. Add stock, bay leaf, and thyme.
Simmer for 30 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
Preheat broiler. Ladle soup into ovenproof bowls. Top with baguette slices and cheese.
Broil until cheese is bubbly and golden. Serve immediately.

France.name: Confit de Canard
France.description: Duck legs slow-cooked in their own fat until tender, then crisped.
instructions: Rub duck legs with salt. Refrigerate overnight.
Preheat oven to 150°C (300°F). Rinse and dry duck legs.
Melt duck fat in an ovenproof dish. Add duck legs, garlic, thyme, bay leaves, and peppercorns.
Cook in oven for 2-3 hours until very tender.
Remove duck from fat (reserve fat for other uses).
To serve, crisp duck skin in a hot pan for 2-3 minutes per side.
Serve with potatoes sautéed in duck fat.

France.name: Tarte Tatin
France.description: Upside-down apple tart with caramelized apples and buttery pastry.
instructions: Make caramel with sugar in oven-safe pan
Add butter and vanilla to caramel
Arrange apples in caramel, cut side down
Cover with pastry, tuck edges down
Cool 5 minutes, then invert onto plate

France.name: Escargots
France.description: Burgundy snails baked in garlic-parsley butter, a classic French appetizer.
instructions: Mix butter with garlic, parsley, and shallots
Season with wine, salt, and pepper

France.name: Cassoulet
France.description: Hearty white bean casserole with duck confit, sausage, and lamb.
instructions: Cook beans with aromatics until tender
Layer beans and meats in casserole
Add cooking liquid to barely cover
Break crust several times during cooking

France.name: Salade Niçoise
France.description: A composed salad from Nice with tuna, eggs, and vegetables.
instructions: Make dressing by whisking all ingredients together.
Arrange lettuce leaves on a platter.
Compose salad by arranging tuna, eggs, green beans, potatoes, tomatoes, cucumber, and olives in sections.
Drizzle with dressing. Garnish with anchovies if using.

France.name: Crème Brûlée
France.description: Rich vanilla custard topped with caramelized sugar crust.
instructions: Bake in water bath at 300°F for 35 minutes
Sprinkle with sugar and torch until caramelized

China.name: Kung Pao Chicken
China.description: Spicy Sichuan stir-fry with chicken, peanuts, and dried chilies.
instructions: Marinate chicken with wine, soy sauce, cornstarch
Heat wok until smoking, add oil
Add chilies and peppercorns, fry until fragrant
Toss with peanuts and green onions

China.name: Peking Duck
China.description: Crispy roasted duck served with pancakes, scallions, and hoisin sauce.
instructions: Clean duck, prick skin all over
Rub with five-spice and salt, marinate overnight
Hang duck to air-dry for 4-6 hours
Let rest, then carve skin and meat separately
Serve with pancakes, sauce, and vegetables

China.name: Mapo Tofu
China.description: Spicy Sichuan tofu in chili bean sauce with ground pork.
instructions: Brown ground pork in hot oil
Add garlic and chili bean paste
Stir-fry until fragrant and oil turns red
Add stock, soy sauce, and sugar
Garnish with peppercorns and green onions

China.name: Sweet and Sour Pork
China.description: Crispy pork pieces in tangy sweet and sour sauce with vegetables.
instructions: Coat pork in cornstarch, deep fry until golden
Mix sauce ingredients in small bowl
Add pineapple and sauce to vegetables
Return pork to wok, toss to coat

China.name: Dim Sum Dumplings
China.description: Steamed pork and shrimp dumplings in translucent wrapper.
ingredients: Soy sauce and chili oil for serving
instructions: Place filling in center of wrapper
Gather wrapper edges, twist to seal

China.name: Fried Rice
China.description: Wok-fried rice with eggs, vegetables, and choice of protein.
instructions: Scramble eggs, remove and set aside
Add more oil, stir-fry garlic briefly
Add cold rice, break up lumps
Return eggs, season with soy sauce
Finish with sesame oil and green onions

China.name: Hot Pot
China.description: Interactive meal of raw ingredients cooked in simmering broth at the table.
ingredients: Dipping sauces: sesame paste, soy sauce, chili oil
instructions: Set up hot pot burner and divided pot
Cook ingredients in broth using chopsticks
Dip cooked food in personal sauce bowls

China.name: Wonton Soup
China.description: Delicate pork and shrimp wontons in clear chicken broth.
instructions: Mix pork, shrimp, ginger, and seasonings
Place small amount of filling on wonton wrapper
Wet edges, fold and seal into triangle
Bring large pot of water to boil
Cook wontons until they float, about 4 minutes

China.name: General Tso's Chicken
China.description: Crispy chicken pieces in sweet and spicy sauce with dried chilies.
instructions: Coat chicken in egg, then cornstarch
Deep fry until golden and crispy
Heat oil in wok, fry chilies until fragrant
Add garlic and ginger, stir briefly
Mix sauce ingredients, add to wok
Return chicken, toss to coat in sauce
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds

China.name: Spring Rolls
China.description: Crispy fried rolls filled with vegetables and sometimes meat.
ingredients: Sweet and sour sauce for dipping
instructions: Season with soy sauce and sesame oil
Deep fry until golden and crispy

Thailand.name: Pad Thai
Thailand.description: Classic Thai stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, and vegetables in sweet-tangy sauce.
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft
Heat oil in wok, scramble eggs and set aside
Stir-fry shrimp and tofu until cooked
Add drained noodles and sauce ingredients
Toss with bean sprouts, eggs, and green onions
Garnish with peanuts and serve with lime

Thailand.name: Tom Yum Goong
Thailand.description: Spicy and sour Thai soup with shrimp, mushrooms, and aromatic herbs.
instructions: Bring stock to boil with lemongrass and lime leaves
Add tom yum paste and chilies
Add shrimp and cook until pink
Season with fish sauce and lime juice
Garnish with cilantro and serve hot

Thailand.name: Green Curry
Thailand.description: Creamy coconut curry with green chilies, Thai basil, and choice of meat.
instructions: Heat thick coconut milk in pan until oil separates
Pour remaining coconut milk and bring to boil
Simmer until tender, garnish with basil

Thailand.name: Mango Sticky Rice
Thailand.description: Sweet dessert of coconut sticky rice served with fresh mango slices.
instructions: Heat coconut milk with sugar and salt
Mix hot rice with half the coconut sauce
Let rice absorb liquid for 30 minutes
Serve rice with mango and coconut sauce

Thailand.name: Som Tam
Thailand.description: Fresh and spicy green papaya salad with lime, chilies, and peanuts.
instructions: Pound chilies and garlic in mortar
Add lime juice, fish sauce, and sugar
Add papaya and carrots, pound gently
Mix in tomatoes and green beans

Thailand.name: Massaman Curry
Thailand.description: Rich, Persian-influenced curry with beef, potatoes, and warm spices.
instructions: Brown beef in coconut cream with curry paste
Add remaining coconut milk and simmer 1 hour
Add potatoes and onion, cook 20 minutes
Season with tamarind, sugar, and fish sauce

Thailand.name: Thai Basil Stir Fry
Thailand.description: Spicy stir-fry with holy basil, chilies, and ground meat over rice.
instructions: Heat oil in wok over high heat
Stir-fry garlic and chilies until fragrant
Add ground meat, break up and cook through
Add basil leaves, stir until wilted
Serve over rice with fried egg

Thailand.name: Tom Kha Gai
Thailand.description: Creamy coconut chicken soup with galangal, lime leaves, and mushrooms.
instructions: Simmer coconut milk with galangal and lemongrass
Add chicken stock and lime leaves
Add chicken and mushrooms, cook 5 minutes
Season with fish sauce and chilies

Thailand.name: Pad See Ew
Thailand.description: Wide rice noodles stir-fried with dark soy sauce, Chinese broccoli, and egg.
instructions: Heat oil in wok over high heat
Add noodles and both soy sauces
Return eggs to wok, toss everything together

Thailand.name: Larb
Thailand.description: Spicy meat salad with herbs, lime juice, and toasted rice powder.
instructions: Cook ground meat in dry pan until done
Let cool slightly, mix with lime juice
Add fish sauce and chili flakes
Mix in rice powder and onions
Serve with lettuce cups and sticky rice

Spain.name: Paella
Spain.description: Saffron rice dish with seafood, chicken, and vegetables from Valencia.
instructions: Heat olive oil in paella pan
Add rice, stir to coat with oil
Add hot saffron stock and paprika
Let rest 5 minutes, garnish with lemon

Spain.name: Gazpacho
Spain.description: Cold soup made from ripe tomatoes, peppers, and bread from Andalusia.
instructions: Soak bread in water, squeeze out excess
Strain through fine mesh if desired
Adjust seasoning with salt and vinegar
Serve cold with ice cubes and garnishes

Spain.name: Tortilla Española
Spain.description: Thick Spanish omelet with potatoes and onions.
instructions: Slowly cook potatoes and onions in oil until tender
Beat eggs with salt in large bowl
Heat 2 tbsp reserved oil in non-stick pan
Add egg mixture, cook until set on bottom
Flip using plate, cook other side until golden

Spain.name: Jamón Ibérico
Spain.description: Dry-cured ham from black Iberian pigs, served thinly sliced.
instructions: Arrange ham slices on serving platter
Let come to room temperature 30 minutes

Spain.name: Churros con Chocolate
Spain.description: Fried dough pastries served with thick hot chocolate for dipping.
ingredients: For chocolate: dark chocolate, milk, cornstarch
instructions: Boil water with sugar, salt, and oil
Remove from heat, add flour all at once
Pipe through star tip into hot oil
Roll in cinnamon sugar while warm

Spain.name: Patatas Bravas
Spain.description: Crispy fried potatoes with spicy tomato sauce and garlic aioli.
ingredients: For sauce: tomato sauce, smoked paprika, cayenne
For aioli: mayonnaise, garlic, lemon juice
instructions: Fry potato cubes until golden and crispy
Make spicy sauce with tomato and paprika

Spain.name: Sangria
Spain.description: Spanish wine punch with fruit, brandy, and sparkling water.
instructions: Add sparkling water just before serving
Serve over ice with fruit pieces

Spain.name: Fabada Asturiana
Spain.description: Hearty white bean stew with chorizo, morcilla, and pancetta from Asturias.
instructions: Cook beans in fresh water with bay leaves
In separate pan, brown all sausages
Add sausages to beans after 1 hour
Sauté onion and garlic until soft
Add to pot with saffron and paprika

Spain.name: Pisto
Spain.description: Spanish ratatouille with tomatoes, peppers, zucchini, and eggplant.
instructions: Heat olive oil in large pan
Cook onion and garlic until soft

Spain.name: Crema Catalana
Spain.description: Catalan custard dessert with caramelized sugar top, similar to crème brûlée.
instructions: Heat milk with lemon zest and cinnamon
Whisk egg yolks with sugar until pale
Return to heat, stir until thickened
Sprinkle with sugar, caramelize with torch

Greece.name: Moussaka
Greece.description: Layered casserole with eggplant, meat sauce, and creamy béchamel topping.
ingredients: For béchamel: butter, flour, milk, cheese
instructions: Brush with oil, bake until golden
Brown meat with onions and garlic
Make béchamel sauce with butter, flour, milk

Greece.name: Greek Salad
Greece.description: Fresh salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Toss gently and let stand 10 minutes

Greece.name: Souvlaki
Greece.description: Grilled meat skewers marinated in olive oil, lemon, and herbs.
instructions: Marinate pork in oil, lemon, garlic, oregano 4+ hours
Grill over high heat, turning frequently
Cook until charred outside, juicy inside
Wrap in pita or serve on plates

Greece.name: Spanakopita
Greece.description: Spinach and feta pie wrapped in crispy phyllo pastry.
instructions: Sauté onion until soft, add spinach
Mix spinach with feta, eggs, and dill
Layer half phyllo sheets, brushing with butter
Add filling, top with remaining phyllo
Brush top with butter, score into squares
Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes until golden

Greece.name: Tzatziki
Greece.description: Creamy yogurt dip with cucumber, garlic, and fresh herbs.
instructions: Grate cucumber, salt heavily, drain 1 hour
Squeeze out excess water from cucumber
Mix yogurt with garlic and lemon juice
Serve with pita, vegetables, or grilled meats

Greece.name: Dolmades
Greece.description: Grape leaves stuffed with rice, herbs, and sometimes meat.
instructions: Sauté onion until soft, add rice
Add nuts, currants, herbs, and seasonings
Cook rice mixture until just tender
Place filling on grape leaves, roll tightly
Layer in pot with lemon juice and oil

Greece.name: Avgolemono Soup
Greece.description: Creamy lemon soup with chicken, rice, and egg-lemon sauce.
instructions: Bring broth to boil, add rice
Temper egg mixture with hot broth
Return to pot, stir until thickened

Greece.name: Pastitsio
Greece.description: Greek pasta bake with meat sauce and creamy béchamel topping.
instructions: Brown meat with onions and spices
Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes until golden

Greece.name: Baklava
Greece.description: Sweet pastry layers with nuts and honey syrup.
ingredients: For syrup: 1 cup honey, 1 cup sugar, 1 cup water
instructions: Layer half phyllo, brushing each with butter
Top with remaining phyllo and butter
Make syrup, pour over hot baklava

Greece.name: Greek Lemon Potatoes
Greece.description: Roasted potatoes in olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano.
instructions: Whisk oil, lemon juice, and broth
Add garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper
Pour over potatoes, toss to coat
Turn potatoes, add more broth if needed

Morocco.name: Tagine
Morocco.description: Slow-cooked stew with lamb, apricots, and warm spices in conical clay pot.
instructions: Brown lamb pieces in tagine base
Add onions and spices, cook until fragrant
Add enough water to barely cover
Garnish with herbs and preserved lemon

Morocco.name: Couscous
Morocco.description: Steamed semolina grains served with vegetable and meat stew.
instructions: Brown meat with onions and spices
Add vegetables in order of cooking time
Fluff couscous with butter and salt
Serve couscous with stew and broth

Morocco.name: Pastilla
Morocco.description: Sweet and savory pie with pigeon or chicken, almonds, and phyllo pastry.
instructions: Cook chicken with onion and spices until tender
Beat eggs into hot broth to make scramble
Toast almonds with cinnamon and sugar
Layer phyllo in pan, brushing with butter
Layer chicken, egg mixture, and almonds
Top with phyllo, bake until golden

Morocco.name: Harira Soup
Morocco.description: Traditional soup with lentils, chickpeas, tomatoes, and aromatic spices.
instructions: Simmer 20 minutes until lentils are soft
Cook 15 minutes more until rice is tender
Finish with lemon juice and fresh herbs

Morocco.name: Kefta Tagine
Morocco.description: Spiced meatballs in tomato sauce topped with baked eggs.
instructions: Mix meat with onion, herbs, and spices
Brown meatballs in tagine or skillet
Make wells in sauce, crack in eggs
Cover and cook until eggs are set

Morocco.name: Moroccan Mint Tea
Morocco.description: Sweet green tea infused with fresh mint leaves, served ceremonially.
instructions: Add tea leaves and small amount of water
Add sugar and mint to pot
Pour from height to create foam
Serve in small glasses, pour from high

Morocco.name: Mechoui
Morocco.description: Slow-roasted lamb shoulder with traditional spice rub.
instructions: Make slits in lamb, insert garlic slivers
Mix spices with oil to make paste
Rub spice paste all over lamb

Morocco.name: Chebakia
Morocco.description: Sesame cookies shaped like flowers, fried and dipped in honey.
instructions: Add oil and orange blossom water
Roll thin, cut into flower shapes

Morocco.name: Zaalouk
Morocco.description: Smoky eggplant and tomato salad with garlic and spices.
instructions: Char eggplants over open flame until soft
Stir in herbs and olive oil
Serve at room temperature with bread

Morocco.name: Rfissa
Morocco.description: Comfort dish of chicken and lentils served over torn flatbread.
instructions: Cook chicken with onions and spices
Add lentils and herbs, simmer until tender
Pour hot broth over bread to soften

Turkey.name: Doner Kebab
Turkey.description: Seasoned meat cooked on a vertical rotisserie, commonly served in pita bread with vegetables.
instructions: In a bowl, mix meat with onion, garlic, spices, salt, and pepper. Marinate for at least 2 hours.
Thread meat onto skewers or stack in a loaf pan to mimic rotisserie.
Roast in the oven at 200°C (390°F) for 45 minutes, basting occasionally.
Serve in pita bread with vegetables and sauce of choice.

South Korea.name: Bibimbap
South Korea.description: A mixed rice dish topped with assorted vegetables, meat, and a spicy gochujang sauce.
instructions: Sauté each vegetable separately with a bit of oil, salt, and garlic. Set aside.
Cook beef slices with soy sauce, garlic, and pepper until done.
In a bowl, place rice at the bottom. Arrange vegetables and beef on top.
Place the fried egg in the center.
Drizzle with sesame oil and sprinkle sesame seeds.
Serve with gochujang on the side. Mix thoroughly before eating.

Lebanon.name: Hummus
Lebanon.description: Creamy chickpea dip with tahini, lemon juice, and garlic.
instructions: Add tahini, garlic, and lemon juice
Blend while adding water for consistency
Season with salt and adjust flavors
Garnish with paprika and pine nuts

Vietnam.name: Pho
Vietnam.description: Aromatic noodle soup with flavorful broth.
instructions: Simmer bones with spices for 6+ hours
Assemble bowl with noodles, meat, then pour hot broth

Vietnam.name: Bun Cha
Vietnam.description: Grilled pork with rice noodles and herbs.
instructions: Marinate pork in fish sauce, sugar, garlic
Prepare dipping sauce with fish sauce, lime, sugar
Serve with fresh herbs and dipping sauce

Vietnam.name: Goi Cuon
Vietnam.description: Fresh spring rolls with shrimp and herbs.
instructions: Cook pork belly and slice thinly
Soften rice paper in warm water

Vietnam.name: Cao Lau
instructions: Marinate pork in char siu sauce
Assemble bowl with noodles, greens, pork

Vietnam.name: Banh Xeo
instructions: Mix batter with rice flour, turmeric, coconut milk
Add bean sprouts and mung beans
Fold crepe in half when crispy
Serve with lettuce and fish sauce

Vietnam.name: Banh Cuon
instructions: Soak and grind rice for batter
Saute filling with mushrooms and shallots
Serve with nuoc cham dipping sauce
Garnish with herbs and fried shallots

Brazil.name: Feijoada
Brazil.description: Hearty black bean stew with pork.
instructions: Combine everything in pot with bay leaves
Serve with rice, farofa, and orange slices

Brazil.name: Pão de Queijo
instructions: Heat milk and oil until boiling
Pour over tapioca flour and mix
Add eggs one at a time
Bake at 375°F until puffed and golden

Peru.name: Ceviche
Peru.description: Fresh raw fish cured in citrus.
instructions: Marinate in lime juice with salt
Serve with boiled corn and sweet potato

Portugal.name: Bacalhau à Brás
Portugal.description: Shredded cod with potatoes and eggs.
instructions: Cut potatoes into matchsticks and fry
Mix all ingredients with beaten eggs

Malaysia.name: Nasi Lemak
instructions: Cook rice with coconut milk and pandan
Arrange all components on banana leaf
Serve with fried chicken or rendang

Indonesia.name: Rendang
instructions: Simmer beef in coconut milk and spices

Egypt.name: Koshari
Egypt.description: National dish with lentils, rice and pasta.

Colombia.name: Bandeja Paisa
instructions: Arrange all items on large platter

Ethiopia.name: Doro Wat
Ethiopia.description: Spicy chicken stew with boiled eggs.
instructions: Add berbere spice and niter kibbeh

Jamaica.name: Jerk Chicken
Jamaica.description: Spicy, smoky grilled chicken with Scotch bonnet peppers.

Germany.name: Sauerbraten
Germany.description: Pot roast marinated in vinegar and spices.
instructions: Brown meat and simmer in marinade

South Africa.name: Bobotie
South Africa.description: Spiced minced meat with egg topping.

Iran.name: Chelow Kabab
Iran.description: Persian saffron rice with grilled meat.

Belgium.name: Moules-Frites
instructions: Add wine and bring to boil

Austria.name: Wiener Schnitzel
Austria.description: Breaded veal cutlet fried to golden perfection.
instructions: Dredge in flour, egg, then breadcrumbs
Serve with lemon and potato salad

Kenya.name: Ugali
instructions: Serve with sukuma wiki or stew

Singapore.name: Hainanese Chicken Rice
instructions: Fry rice in chicken fat with aromatics
Accompany with dark soy and chili
